objectif est de former: The objective is to train middle managers in the field of Marketing and Commerce, capable of being immediately operational and quickly evolving into positions of responsibility. The purpose of the Bachelor's Degree in Marketing is to provide skills in demand in commercial and corporate communications service jobs. This license program helps the salesperson to reach a sales executive level and develop their career towards positions of responsibility.
Le licencier: The Marketing graduate has a working level which allows him to quickly get a job. The nature of the training allows a wide choice of highly versatile commercial functions. Marketing - distribution - sales - advertising.
Conditions d'accès à la formation et pré: Conditions of access to training and prerequisites
Baccalauréat mathematiques,sciences expr: Mathematics baccalaureate, experiential sciences, economics, management, IT, letters, sport, technique.
A la fin de la formation, les participan: At the end of the training, participants should be able to
Matriser les langues (francais,anglais)e: Master languages (French, English) and IT tools
Etre capable d'analyser son marché,de sy: To be able to analyze your market, to synthesize this data and to take initiatives.
Etablir la stratégie marketing de l'entr: Establish the company's marketing strategy and ensure its proper application.
Connaitre les besoins des clients et éga: Know the needs of customers and also the competition.
Définir la stratégie commerciale et mark: Define the company's sales and marketing strategy.
Trouver des opportunités à exploiter et: Find opportunities to exploit and know the competition.
Elaborer un plan marketing grace à des é: Develop a marketing plan through both quantitative and qualitative marketing studies.
Définir le positionnement,lacommunicatio: Define positioning, communication, image, distribution policy.
Etre une personne créative,rigoureuse,pr: To be a creative, rigorous, pragmatic person.
Avoir les qualité de leadership et de pe: Have the qualities of leadership and persuasion.
Avoir la capacité de travailler en équip: Have the ability to work in a team
Etudes des masterès professionnelles ou: Professional or research master's studies in management sciences
Erasmus,Co-diplomation,PFE,Bourse d'alte: Erasmus, Co-diplomation, PFE, Work-study grant, Sponsorship.
Formation initiale, Formation continue,: Initial training, Continuing training, Work-study training
Première année: Tronc commun en Sciences: First year: Common core in Management Sciences
Deuxième année Première année: Tronc com: Second year First year: Common core in Management Sciences
Visite d'entreprise désignée par l'ensei: Company visit designated by the teacher
Méthodologie d'elaboration d'un rapport: Methodology for preparing an internship report
Troixieme année Licence fondamentale en: Third year Basic license in Management Sciences-Mention Marketing
Elaboration et validation du rapport de: Preparation and validation of the internship report
Descriptif des stages et des activités p: Description of internships and practical end-of-study activities
Inter liaisons entre les semestres du pa: Inter links between the semesters of the course, gateways (to be specified), evaluation and progression
Le premier: The first and second are reserved for common modules: basic license in private law and fundamental license in public law. The options are mandatory. The third, fourth, fifth and sixth semesters are reserved for specialization; It is within this framework that specific topics in public law are dealt with. It should be noted that the six-semester program complies with the recommendations of the Sectorial Law Commission.
